name: SCG GARCINIA CAMBOGIA
description:
SCG Garcinia Cambogia blocks the enzyme that converts sugar into fat, increases your metabolism and suppresses your appetite creating an exceptionally effective weight loss supplement.

BENEFITS OF GARCINIA CAMBOGIA: 
- Blocks Fat Production 
- Suppresses Appetite 
- Increases your Serotonin Levels 
- Includes HCA (Hydroxycitric Acid) 
- All Natural Weight Loss 
- No Side Effects

DR OZ TALKED ABOUT GARCINIA CAMBOGIA ON HIS SHOW OCT 28, 2012: 
- "NO Diet, NO Exercise, NO Effort" 
- "Newest, fastest revolutionary fat buster" 
- "The most exciting breakthrough in natural weight loss to date" 
- "The magic ingredient that lets you lose weight without diet or exercise" 
- "The simple solution you have been looking for to bust your fat for good"

name: SCG VEST
description:
(THE VEST IS VERY TIGHT, IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A SLIM BUILT GO A SIZE UP TO ENSURE FIT!! THE VEST IS LONG AND MAY FOLD AT THE BOTTOM)

The SCG Vest gives you curves and a slimmer waist, also targeting the unwanted "back fat". Consistent use will change the shape of your body. "Slimming your body to bring out your fashionable silhouette."

The SCG Vest is considered "high-compression" and is intended to have a tight fit. If your stomach is a little larger, choose a size up to ensure fit. As your body slims, two columns of hook and eye closures allow the garment to slim down with you. Wear the SCG Vest for a minimum of 8-10 hours a day, for at least 30 days to experience long-term results.

*Toning abdominal muscles 
*Lose inches instantly. 
*High compression. 
*Losing weight from back. 
*Lose 1-4 inches in 30 days. 
*Discreetly worn under clothes. 
*Reduce waist and abdomen. 
*Improves posture. 
*Strengthens core.

(PLEASE READ FAQ'S ABOUT THE RETURN & EXCHANGE POLICY & FOR ALL OTHER QUESTIONS.)
